articles.author: John Hudson, Hannah Natanson
articles.title: Trump administration abruptly recalls over two dozen career ambassadors - The Washington Post
articles.description: A senior State Department official called it a bid to ensure adherence to the “America First” agenda while others called it a devastating blow to America’s diplomatic corps.
articles.content: The Trump administration has recalled more than two dozen career diplomats from ambassador positions and other senior posts around the world as it works to enforce adherence with President Donald Tru… [+64 chars]
